title: Node Schmode: Pythonic Real-Time Web
summary:
Using gevent, pyramid and socket-io for a micro framework approach to
creating real-time web apps without the braces. Why is gevent so cool
and how it can let you write fast scalable apps with asynchronous IO
without twisting your mind.
